alert.note: Alert for Morgan County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 05 at 4:57AM MDT until April 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Fort Morgan, Akron, Julesburg, and Holyoke. * WHEN...High winds will develop this morning and continue through early evening. Similar winds are expected on Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and a few power outages may result. Strong winds will likely lead to rapid fire growth of any new fire. Blowing dust will reduce visibility to less than a quarter mile in places.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Avoid outdoor burning or any activity that may cause sparks. The strong winds will likely fuel rapid fire growth.

area.areaDesc: Morgan County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County; Washington County
